extendedInfo.description: India's #1 Astrology Team: Bejan Daruwalla's GaneshaSpeaks provides you free horoscope for Year 2013. Also get free daily, weekly, monthly and yearly horoscope predictions based on strong, age-old foundations of the Indian Vedic Astrology System. Get free zodiac horoscopes for all rashi: Aries (Mesha), Taurus (Vrishabha), Gemini(Mithun), Cancer (Kataka), Leo (Simha), Virgo (Kanya), Libra (Tula), Scorpio (Vrishchika), Sagittarius (Dhanus), Capricorn (Makara), Aquarius (Kumbha), and Pisces (Meena). Let Ganesha give you insights into all important areas of life i.e. Career forecast, Business, Money, Love, Education, Property and Personal Matters from India's leading astro team.Daily Horoscope:Start your day with the guidance of Ganesha's daily horoscope. Read weekly predictions, monthly predictions and  yearly predictions to see how the future will shape up for you. Be in control of your Bhavishya.Nifty Predictions:Get Ganesha's guidance on Nifty today Relationship Analysis:Get your relationships analysed!  Find out how your relations stack up with your boss, employee, daughter-in-law and mother-in-law.Vaastu:Get Vaastu tips for your home, office and shop. Number Analysis:Find out if your mobile number(s) and vehicle number(s) are lucky or suited for you.Personalised B'day Forecast for Family & friends:Use your Facebook account to send personalised B'day forecasts to family and friends on their birthdays*Some members from your friend list might not appear as they might have blocked external apps from accessing profile informationAstrology FMAn online astrology radio station with 24 hours astrology related programming. Listen to shows like Daily Darpan, Divine Darshan, Astro Advise, Sacred Numbers, Wellness, Health and Healing, Cosmic Call, among others.

reviews.title: Never accurate
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app a couple weeks now,  it\'s the most \'off\' from actuality than any other daily horoscope I\'ve ever read.Un-installing
reviews.author: Lonnellrose Smith

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Actually for the first time i found working astro application, and i mean they really predict..but the only big problem is that i receive the daily horoscope in the evening, so i am reading for past situatuons...please guys fix this bug !!
reviews.author: Lyubka Alexandrova

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: But I didn\'t get the SaaS bahu thing...please change it.I\'m surely gonna give a 5 after that update.
reviews.author: Chinmay R

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I have always been a firm believer in moon based vedic birth charts that have always worked to perfection for me! This is 4 the 1st time that a sun sign based astrology has made any sense to me. Hats off to daruwala!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app.
reviews.comment: Nice application but fonts are very small. Please make fonts big so that we can read without spec.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless predictions
reviews.comment: When it says day is gud..the its bad...when it says u will meet ur soulmate today...im bedridden..with 102*c...all predictions r wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really helpful!!!
reviews.comment: I am using this app from very long time and I really likes it. What it predicts always accurate to 70% and sometimes Hundred percent. But I have one request to you plz give option to read prediction in Hindi also sometimes I can\'t understand the words and I have to take help of dictionary. That\'s ok but sometimes there isn\'t meaning available in Hindi. So plz provide predictions in Hindi also it will also increase your userbase. Dhanayavaad in advance
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Nice-but showing system errors when we click weekly monthly or yearly forecast Amazing and good support from developer. But still some options like personlization is needed. Also matchmaking and relationship test options are not working. But still a great application as per accuracy in. Prediction. Excellent Alok Jain Excellent, Thank you Ganesh ji
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: If this app is vedik astro based then how come it predicts by sun sign? according to vedik astro my RASHI is makar ie capricorn. But this app refers me as aries which is my sign in western astro. wat method does this app really use? It does not also show horoscop for next day or week like sm odr app.  Thej issues need to b sorted out for odrwise fine app.
reviews.author: GAURANG MHATRE

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Asks for birth date but Never opens d zodiac part... Plz fix dat
reviews.author: khyati sharma

reviews.title: Good one
reviews.comment: Keep it up
reviews.author: Amit Bhagwat

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app on my note2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Timing of  readings.
reviews.comment: Timing of reading for the day is late. If it was earlier in the morning I would like it better. There should be an option of our time zones.
reviews.author: Charles Chamberlain

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: Its a awesome app & its predictions & other sections are also working good..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent app.
reviews.author: raghu kumar

reviews.title: Unsatisfied
reviews.comment: Predictions never matched..... Try to improve it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome astro perspective
reviews.comment: Great insight into my day and always unique twist from what my other apps say. Great app!
reviews.author: Catherine Alexandra

reviews.title: Useless predictions!
reviews.comment: Predictions are out of context. And text doesnt appear normal. Text shows as garbled... Uninstalling...
reviews.author: Ansh Gurnani

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: This is awesome. Everything it says is soooo true. Its creepy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Its a nice handy app. Does wat it says.
